name: GameD'état
description:
The game lied to us about being good and lured with it's free price-tag, but all it gave was a boring environment and it's tyranny.

I,  the developer, have created a small army for you and a training level to hone you as a commander. Take on the forces of the game and the cunning game itself that lies, misleads by putting delusions, hiding it's enemies from rendering and not rendering health bars.

But since it is a GameD'état,  you might have a better chance. All the best.
